oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Long-term trials in Europe and North America, experience and research approaches
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Raupp, Joachim
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Soil biology
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An overview will be provided on scientific subjects and research approaches based on 25 long-term field studies located in Europe and North America. Basically, factorial field experiments and farm studies can be distinguished. Key results of soilparameters and crop yields are summarized. Characteristic benefits aa well as inherent drawbacks of long-term experiments are discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Raupp, Joachim (2009) Long-term trials in Europe and North America, experience and research approaches. In: International Workshop of Organic Agriculture Research and Development.
